text: Pierre-Marie Coty (22 November 1927 - 17 July 2020) was an Ivorian Roman Catholic bishop. He was ordained to the priesthood in 1955. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Daloa, Ivory Coast from 1975 to 2005.Diocese of Daloa Coty died on 17 July 2020, aged 92. ==references== Category:1927 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Ivorian people Category:Roman Catholic bishops
title: Pierre-Marie Coty
